title: Calories in a Small Frosty
meta_description: Learn calories in frosty small from Wendy's Chocolate Frosty, with full nutrition facts, macros, sodium, sugars, and easy tweaks for your dessert choice.
assumptions: Wendy's Chocolate Frosty, small size (12 oz / 340 g), standard recipe with milk, cocoa, and sugar; no toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and customizations. Check Wendy's app or menu for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A small Wendy's Chocolate Frosty contains 340 calories and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in frosty small at Wendy's?
faqs.a: A small Chocolate Frosty has 340 calories.

faqs.q: What's the sugar in a small Frosty?
faqs.a: About 42 g of sugars per small serving.

faqs.q: Is a small Frosty high in fat?
faqs.a: It has 9 g total fat, including 6 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in a small Frosty?
faqs.a: Around 9 g of protein from the milk base.
